mapper.select: select PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME productName, IMAGE.IMAGE_FILE imgFileMain, PRODUCT.UNIT_PRICE unitPrice, PRODUCT.UNIT unit, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID productId from BRN_PRODUCT as PRODUCT left join BRN_IMAGE as IMAGE on PRODUCT.PRODUCT_ID = IMAGE.ID where PRODUCT.STATUS = 4 and IMAGE.SEQ =1 offset 0 limit #{topCount}
